page.title: 11TREE SURVEY.
page.content: Whilst walking around the area we did a tree count. We found trees along avenues and roadsides as well as in the fields. In one road e.g. in Brookfield road, about 125 trees were counted. In Warrington road,Twyford lane and Mill lane we counted 43 trees in total. Near Brook-House farm, 7 trees were counted. At Finches Plantation there were 40 trees and at the Smallpox hospital, now demolished, we counted 12 trees. We also found 8 trees along Whittle Brook. Although not all the trees could be identified, we did however recognise some Oak,Alder and Chestnut trees. Most of the trees near the houses were artificially planted. Very few of the "natural" trees were immature.
